text: Antônio de Jesus Dias (28 January 1942 - 3 September 2020) was a Brazilian politician. He was born in Anápolis, Goiás. He was a member of the Chamber of Deputies three separate times. Jesus Dias was Deputy between 1980 to 1981, again from 1987 to 1991 and again from 1991 to 1993. He was a member of the Brazilian Democratic Movement. Jesus Dias died on 3 September 2020 in Rio de Janeiro from COVID-19, aged 78.Morre pastor Antonio de Jesus Dias, um dos primeiros líderes da UMADEGO ==References== Category:1942 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Rio de Janeiro Category:Brazilian Democratic Movement politicians Category:Politicians from Goiás
title: Antônio de Jesus Dias
